title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature         Claire Floyd  The area surrounding the park and nearby Kisatchie National Forest are excellent places to view unpolluted night skys.  Â     Tree lovers can come to the park and enjoy a variety of pecan, magnolia, crape myrtle, and our majestic live oaks. The park sits along  migratory migratory bird routes and is also a popular destination for birders. In recent years the park has also become a popular jumping off point for cyclist who ride through the sceneic Cane River National Heritage Area.
